title: Essential Oil Diffusers & Scented Diffuser Oils | ScentSationals
description: Shop essential oil diffusers from ScentSationals. Free shipping on orders over $35. View our full collection of diffusers and scented diffuser oils. Shop now!
cleaned_text: Essential Oil Diffusers & Scented Diffuser Oil Blends [home fragrance oils](https://scentsationals.com/)and essential oil diffusers. Choose from our wide selection that will help create a refreshing environment. Each diffuser paired with essential oils is ideal for enhancing the atmosphere at home or the office. While the benefits of scented diffuser oils vary from person to person, you could potentially see the benefits of using aromatherapy in your home, areas that promote restfulness and relaxation, a more calming atmosphere, mood boosts, and more. Our diffusers are also beautiful and will add to the ambiance of your home.
